summary: The customer was interested in Contoso Wireless's internet services and asked about downgrading their current plan to something more affordable. The agent explained that Contoso Wireless offers several packages for home and business users, including a Basic package with up to 10 Mbps download speeds and unlimited data, and an Economy package with up to 6 Mbps download speeds and a 500 GB data cap. The agent also mentioned that the customer can switch to either of these packages at any time by contacting Contoso Wireless.
